Plugin.name: Open AI Completion
Modal.tabs.settings.temperature.hint.tex: Between 0 and 1 (default). Higher values means the model will take more risks. Try 0,9 for more creative applications, and 0 for ones with a well-defined answer.
Modal.tabs.settings.maxTokens.hint.text: The token count of your prompt plus max_tokens cannot exceed the model's context length. Most models have a context length of 2048 tokens (except for the newest models, which support 4096).
